original_text: And all the angels stood round about the throne, and about the elders and the four beasts, and fell before the throne on their faces, and worshipped God,
korean_text: 모든 천사가 보좌와 장로들과 네 생물의 주위에 서 있다가 보좌 앞에 엎드려 얼굴을 대고 하나님께 경배하여

sentences.original_text: And all the angels stood round about the throne,
and about the elders and four beasts,
and fell before the throne on their faces,
